channel.title: CVE Feed for careteditor -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-42967|2024-08-03T13:19:05.492Z -- careteditor -- caret
item.description: Caret is vulnerable to an XSS attack when the user opens a crafted Markdown file when preview mode is enabled. This directly leads to client-side code execution.
